channel.title: Harry's Creative Space
channel.description: Recent content on Harry's Creative Space

item.title: Horror Game : Magic Theif
item.description: Introduction: PC, First person single player horror game, playing as a white-collar worker who was caught by killer at 6:06 am one day. Without any special skills and strength, player need depend on himself to solve puzzles in each level of the house and escape from killer.

item.title: Name of the work : Deadly Game
item.description: Introduction: PC, First person single player horror game, playing as a white-collar worker who was caught by killer at 6:06 am one day. Without any special skills and strength, player need depend on himself to solve puzzles in each level of the house and escape from killer.
